alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 23 at 2:21AM PDT until October 23 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23. * WHERE...Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area, Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake, Northern Washoe County, Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties, Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties and Surprise Valley California. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even colder temperatures are expected tonight into Monday morning with a hard freeze all areas. If you haven`t done so yet, now is a good time to winterize irrigation systems and prepare for routine freezing temperatures.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
